concept.title: 514.304 Late bids, late modifications of bids, or late withdrawal of bids.

conbody.p: Upon receiving a late bid, the bid custodian records it on the duplicate copy of the list of bidders. The bid custodian then immediately notifies the responsible contracting officer of the bid. The contracting officer must arrange for pick-up or delivery of the bid.
